Name: TAXIDERMY
About the game: Taxidermy is a first person horror experience with the 80's slasher aesthetics Story Alex is a great fan of taxidermy and he just bought a new product on the internet with the 'Taxidermy Brothers', but it was never delivered. After several months, Alex is going on an event right in the city of the store. On the way back to home, Alex decides to stop on the Taxidermy Brothers Store/House to get his product. He just didn't expected to get locked inside the house of an insane taxidermist Now, surviving is up to you! - Feel the tension of beeing chased in a fast paced run - Explore the creepy house to find your way out - Beware with the 'taxidermized' animals
Meta Title: TAXIDERMY: Jan 14, 2020, Fernando Tittz and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TAXIDERMY? Check out the release date (Jan 14, 2020), developer insights from Fernando Tittz, and a complete game summary.
